On 6/4/07, Peter Lacey <placey@...> wrote:
> So, does one practice (connectedness) trump the other (representational
> symmetry)? Or should the server accept messages with unwanted URLs and
> fields and simply toss them away?

It's not "tossing them away" if it's a request to set the field to the
value it would be anyway.  That's a successful PUT.

Mark.
